data.description: Read Only Text Widget with simple serach
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module was crated because Tk::More has many dependecies (It is
    a part of Tk-pod which is dependent on 4 other moudules).

    Some people don't want to load so many modules for this
    functinality.

    I plan to use module in a commercial enviroment, as a report
    browsing utility by end users. Search feature has less option to
    enable end user fast usage.
